channel.title: Posts on Aaron Berk
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aaron Berk

item.title: Future [Mathematics] Leaders
item.description: This post was written as part of the Math section for the 2019-2020 Future Science Leaders program. If you’re interested in using any of the resources below for your own outreach program, there are two caveats. You are free to use any of my materials with proper attribution. However, some of the materials below were created or co-created by Matt Coles and for these you should e-mail us to check.

item.title: Reflection: 2018 BC Data Science Workshop
item.description: A brief summary and some incomplete reflections from the 2018 BC Data Science workshop.

item.title: Resource Links
item.description: A kind of repository for some links to blogs and resources that I’ve found useful over the years.

item.title: Matrix Completion Whirlwind
item.description: A post describing the code for a matrix completion tutorial I wrote for the 2017 BC Data Science workshop

item.title: Reflection: 2017 BC Data Science Workshop
item.description: A brief summary and some incomplete reflections from my time as the workshop TA for the 2017 BC Data Science workshop.
